title: Class Project Band Logo.
content:
This is a band logo created for one of my classes.

critique away.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312105036im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/thenapoleoncomplexlogo_6555.jpg)

 [‹ Your professional opinion. Just out of curiousity.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312105036/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42648 "Go to previous forum topic") [Personal identity for crit ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312105036/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42231 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mandatorycannibalism

comments.content: That may be usable for an album cover but as a logo it is completely all too busy. Try simplifying it or shifting the words around.

Could you repost at a much smaller size? It’s hardly legible at this size, but scaling down might help.

What type of music does the band play? Where are they located? Who listens to them? I figure it’s fictional, but those are still quite relevant. :)
